attributes.action: Get us out of the EU Now
attributes.additional_details: What has being a member of the European Community done for Great Britain? Nothing as far as I can see, except to expect us to pay exhorbitant amounts of money to who? I have no idea, it seems just to belong. We are ruled by them, we have no say in anything and we have to bail out everyone, when do they bail us out? Never it seems. The state of the countries who took on the Euro as a currency speaks for itself
